sentence: I'm glad Brian Kemp is answering my call for constitutional carry in Georgia.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Brian Kemp Plans to Ease Gun Laws in Georgia: Carry Permit' Should Be the Founding Document of Our Nation'

author: Rebekah Sager
title: Stacey Abrams turns tables on Gov. Kemp, files suit to use law he signed for himself in her favor

author: Rebekah Sager
title: Stacey Abrams turns tables on Gov. Kemp, files suit to use law he signed for himself in her favor

sentence: "After months and months of Brian Kemp having exclusive ability to raise unlimited funds as a result of the bill he signed, Kemp will no longer be able to raise these funds while Stacey Abrams and [her leadership committee] One Georgia are denied equal ability to operate under the same rules.
author: Cami Mondeaux
title: Brian Kemp's campaign fundraising suspended until after GOP primary, judge rules
